project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Urban Infrastructure Services Development Project (UISDP) is to contribute to the expansion and solidification of the credit market for public autonomous and private providers of local public services by enhancing FINDETER's (Financiera de Desarrollo Territorial) (Local Development Bank) capacity to offer long-term financing for urban infrastructure investments. The project's single component will consist of urban infrastructure investments consisting of subprojects undertaken by public autonomous and private entities to develop, improve or expand provision of urban public services in eligible sectors (including detailed engineering design and construction supervision cost to be financed by counterpart funds from project entities).
